fields.name: ID
fields.desc: Semi-colon separated list of unique identifiers where available

fields.name: REF
fields.desc: The value in the POS field refers to the position of the first base in the String

fields.name: ALT
fields.desc: Comma separated list of alternate non-reference alleles called on at least one of the samples

fields.name: INFO_OMAPALT
fields.desc: Maps OID,OPOS,OREF,OALT entries to specific ALT alleles

fields.name: INFO_DP
fields.desc: Total read depth at the locus

fields.name: INFO_FDP
fields.desc: Flow Evaluator read depth at the locus

fields.name: INFO_FR
fields.desc: Reason why the variant was filtered.

fields.name: INFO_FSAF
fields.desc: Flow Evaluator Alternate allele observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_FSAR
fields.desc: Flow Evaluator Alternate allele observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_FSRF
fields.desc: Flow Evaluator Reference observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_FSRR
fields.desc: Flow Evaluator Reference observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_HRUN
fields.desc: Run length: the number of consecutive repeats of the alternate allele in the reference genome

fields.name: INFO_HS
fields.desc: Indicate it is at a hot spot

fields.name: INFO_NR
fields.desc: Reason why the variant is a No-Call.

fields.name: INFO_RBI
fields.desc: Distance of bias parameters from zero.

fields.name: INFO_SAF
fields.desc: Alternate allele observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_SAR
fields.desc: Alternate allele observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_SRF
fields.desc: Number of reference observations on the forward strand

fields.name: INFO_SRR
fields.desc: Number of reference observations on the reverse strand

fields.name: INFO_STB
fields.desc: Strand bias in variant relative to reference.

fields.name: INFO_TYPE
fields.desc: The type of allele, either snp, mnp, ins, del, or complex.
